events.title: Kyoto Music Expo
events.description: A music festival taking place at Umekoji Park, featuring a variety of artists and exciting performances.

events.title: Otsu Hikiyama Festival
events.description: Celebrated in Shiga, this festival includes beautiful floats and traditional performances and occurs during the same timeframe.

events.title: Traditional Festivals in Kyoto
events.description: Various traditional events are celebrated in Kyoto during October, including the Kurama Fire Festival.
